entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
